title: Casual PERTH Gamer looking for ranked games with WA people
body:
As the title says. I'm looking for players from WA or anyone who can fit schedule of WA since we are a few hours behind everyone. I can play almost any role but my strongests are support and ADC. 

I mainly play : Ashe, Draven, Vayne,  Vayne as ADC.
Braum, Thresh, Leona, sona and i love playing as Alistar  but also play most support heroes.

In mid-  I main Ryze, malzahar, viktor 
in Jungle: Sion,  Aatrox, Ashe(Sometimes) and vi. Tho I am exploring others
Top:  Wukong, Volibear, Pantheon, Nasus. 

I normally play at least a few games a day, early afternoons and when I get a chance I play evenings. Been playing solo ages, I wanna try having someone or a regular/casual team I can play a few games with, and see where it goes.

add me: Shivarn(In game)

replies.body:
You need to add ign:STEFEN

He is in Perth, ask him to teach you the shield glitch.

hi there, i live in perth XD im a bot lane main. Im only bronze 4 atm but with some work and practise you never know. Would be nice to have someone in my timezone to play with plus the possibility of teaming at rflan XD
I don't mind :) Add me in game :)
